title: Alex Jones Show - 2012 Mar 09 FR [sebaygo1]
description:
.
							
The Alex Jones Show
Friday, 09 March 2012


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................

From the Infowars web site ::

Alex talks with the former presidential nominee of the Constitution Party and the founder and former pastor of Crossroad Baptist Church in Pensacola, Florida, Chuck Baldwin. Mr. Baldwin currently lives in Montana. Baldwin is the co-author of Romans 13: The True Meaning of Submission, now available at the Infowars Store. 

Alex also talks about the latest developments in the coup d'etat lanuched by Obama and the Pentagon and the government's effort to turn the Constitution into a useless relic trumped by the edicts of world government. 

Alex covers the effort by the Justice Department and the FBI to run roughshod over the Fifth Amendment.

 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
